title: Leblanc is still op ;_;
body: Now, I love assassins, infact I used to only play zed and leblanc (sorry), but leblanc has received only buffs a few patches back, and honestly her main problem is that she's basically a safer zed. She has 5 flashes ( counting the sum ). Think about that for a second, and realize how broken that is. Especially with 40% cdr. Her chain length is way too long when it grabs you, that is what needs a nerf imo

the chain is too hard to hit. And there are longer skillshots which do more damage AND go through minions. To hit the chain effectively, the LeBlanc has to use a w+q+e combo which costs half of her mana. The slow is not too high, 25% are like nothing and just help to proc the snare which is pretty important. Maybe it is because I know LeBlanc extremely well, but I have no problems with laning against her.

> [{quoted}](name=lolcaloid,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EfB5GRt9,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-30T00:02:02.528+0000)

Why is it called "Mirror Image" if they look exactly the same? They should call it a true clone if you can't tell the difference. When you look in a mirror, you can spot a key difference between the reflection and the original. The same should be said for picking out the clone instead of losing on a coin toss.
Uhm its blue buff its an obvious differnce, unless what your sayin if i were to look in a mirror im gonna have pink hair i guess.

> [{quoted}](name=lolcaloid,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EfB5GRt9,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-02T00:34:35.720+0000)
>
> Uhm its blue buff its an obvious differnce, unless what your sayin if i were to look in a mirror im gonna have pink hair i guess.

You're really missing the point. If your hair is swept to the left, your mirror image will have hair swept to the right. Likewise, if LeBlanc's legging is on her right leg and the stocking is on her left, her mirror should be the reverse (legging on left, stocking on right). As it stands in-game, her double looks exactly the same as the original model, hence why they should call it a "clone" rather than a "mirror image".

The only champion who should have a true identical clone is Shaco. They're meant to look exactly the same in the first place due to the clone punishing the player that made the wrong choice (exploding in a ring of daggers).

Leblanc and all other ap assys are super weak right now.
Maw/hexdrinker and steraks basically negates their burst. And now adcs are catching on and all buying them.  Leblanc is actually weak as shit. I just typed out Along post a few days ago on why and I don't feel like doing it again but here's a summary:
Any time Leblanc distortions into you, cc or damage her.
Lissandra w, lux q, Diana w, heck I even usually have no problem with E-Q from brand to stun her when she distortions in.
If a Leblanc got fed then either she is a really good Leblanc, or her lane opponent(s) were not good players, or it was bronze(doesn't count), or all of the above mixed.
